link.title: Growing Amid Challenges and Opportunities – The Journey of Chasing Dreams for Jiang Dechao and Zhang Tong (EME)在挑戰與機遇中成長 — 江德超和張桐的逐夢之旅 (機電工程系) – Faculty of Science and Technology | University of Macau

entry.summary: Jiang Dechao and Zhang Tong are outstanding undergraduates of the 2023/2024 academic year from the Department of Electromechanical Engineering (EME) of the University of Macau (UM). They were awarded the Best Project Award in the Department's final year project for their Development and testing of a mobile manipulation robot - “Libot”. The robot
